content.detailedDescription: I arrived at my bus stop on greenville street, at 8:00 am jan 7 2011. i looked up and saw what i thought at first was a military aircraft because it was black and triangular shaped. it did not travel very fast for the military craft i thought it was. as i kept watching it, its shape started to shift. i thought maybe it was a bird or perhaps a balloon but it was way too high and then it turned around and headed the opposite direction. it sped up just a bit and took a black sphere form kept going in one direction then headed higher and stopped. it was hovering there for five minutes as i watched. the whole event lasted about 8 to ten minutes and then my bus came and i lost sight of it. this left me feeling uneasy beacause it was so clear.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started out at as a black triangle flying towards the airport, then its shape started to change, it then turned around and started heading in the opposite direction and turned into  a solid black sphere shape went further up and hovered

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my couch watching tv. my sister was just walking out the door to hang out with her friends when all of a sudden she called for me frantically. i ran outside just in time to see a ball of light split into 3 balls. they hovered for about 15 seconds before going out one by one. then everyone told me about how it had been a giant fireball. my sisters friend got at least one good photo and i got a video. unfortunately, the video cuts out after 2 seconds. this morning my friend said the news was saying it was a skydiver with flares. i do not believe that one bit.
content.summary: A flaming meteorite that stopped suddenly & spread into 3 balls of light.

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired law enforcement officer with more than 25 years experience with radios, communications, and use of of walkie talkies. while working a security detail on 1-7-11 at approximately 1010 hours pm i and another coworker at the base station overheard a brief, loud and clear voice come across our frequency. this was not bleed over, skip, or outside cell phone or other form of interference. it seemed louder and stronger than our power output. i am very familiar with many different languages, and i can say with certainty...And it really creeps me out to say this, it did not sound human. there was a gutteral vowel and consonant pattern spoken at a slighly higher pitch and speed than common human language. it was erie and unintelligable. this exchange took place when i called in a spot check over the walkie to the base station. the base station replied back to me. i heard approximately 5-6 "words" between a brief one-two second period of time a fraction of a second immediately after i was acknowledged to by the base station. this communication i perceived to be a either a mocking or mimicking of the base station message because it seemed to contain the same amount of phonetic groupings and cadence as was broadcasted to me. the signal was crystal clear and it boomed over the frequency, stronger than the normal signal strength. i was really taken back by it, i remember saying to myself "what the h--- was that!!!" out loud to myself. i was approximately 100 yards away and outside from the base station. it was cloudy with high humidity because of the winter storm closing in, temperature about 29 degrees. in all my years of experience i have never heard anything like that over the air, as stated ealier i have heard many different forms of bleed over transmissions, but it was in clear human language. this voice sounded somewhat similar to that of a young adult female, but like 60 % similar, a mix between genders is all i add to it. i went into see the base operator immediately afterward and they said it sounded like a female over the radio. there was a female security officer working but i knew from what i clearly overheard that it was not her. the operator called the female and inquired about the transmission and she stated negative on any recent transmissions. i saw or heard nothing else unusual as i looked around outside immediately after this happened. several other security personnel working farther away on the premises heard nothing unusual, including the female. only myslef and the base  operator heard this unexplainable transmission. of  any past experiences with unexplained phenomina i have had a pre-dawn clear sky sighting in my youth in 1974 of a dime sized held at arms length object that was a bright white oval shape. when i was walking outside to deliver newspapers i saw it motionless at around 45 degrees to the horizon in the air, motionless. after about 2-3 seconds of observing it the bright oval left horizontally at an extremly high rate of speed directly towards and overhead me and out of sight. my wife in 1978 observered a big white slipper shaped craft with windows overhead a neighbors house at close range in the late afternoon. she watched it for approximately 10 seconds as it sat motionless, then it took off in an instant. she didn't recall it until the next day. she said she thought she was being watched by it, and felt compelled not to remember the sighting. recently in the third week of november 2010 while driving down the road around 12:15 am she obervered overhead of the street directly in front of her windshield a dark sillouetted craft against the clear starlit sky. she could only describe as a semi circle, or ball shape on the end of a stick or pole type object that was motionless. as she approached it and observred it for a couple of seconds it took off with a trail behind it away to her left and out of sight. this object was much smaller than the slipper shaped craft she saw years ago. the smaller craft seen recently is within a mile of last evenings radio incident. these have all occurred to us in the same town.
content.summary: Gutteral speeded up voice in unknown dialect heard on walkie-talkie

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. i used to live in phoenix,arizona a few(2)years back and had atleast 4 episodes of seeing ufo's, one episode was followed by missing time for about 6 hours, and another time i awoke with my hair a huge tangled mess like i've never seen my fine hair before or since. i have already reported those events on this website before.

it has been 2 years now since i have seen anything in the sky or had any events. i moved to maine 2 years ago, and unfortuantely, nothing. nothing until last night when i had the most intense dream of all my life. i dreamt that i was back in arizona and was ( with a number of other people) taken away after a whirlwind and me running to hide in the closet where i was praying as if it were the end of the world or my life. and i am an atheist! anyway, i was taken to this intermediate station where i was being evaluated by some aliens that looked liked human sized embryo's in suits. they had something attached to my mouth for breathing. they asked me if i smoked cigarretes and proceeded to have me smoke on through this ectoplasm like attachment to my mouth. they were also evaluating my body and seemed to be communicating something about my foot. now, i have an infection in my r great toe ever since i slammed my foot in a door many years ago. i will either have to remove my nail or be stuck with this nasty fungal infection for life. 

moving on, i was brought to what appeared to be a different galaxy. there were millions of people there. i felt my body was very heavy and i was quite cold. they first greeted me by showing me this hand signal that my hands could not replicate. i kept on asking questions about god and the afterlife, and if i would ever see my family again, etc..They told me the biblical god was not true. they asked me if they could pick up my mother the following day, but i explained to them that my mother was a religious woman, and would be frightened by the experience. they gave me something to drink, but i apparently drank too much of it and they had to keep me longer for observation. i looked at my hands and they looked frostbit. i walked around this new galaxy which seemed to have housing installations that were similar to our own, yet they had a sort of flexibility about them that i can not explain. and everything was moving very fast. i was taken back to the original examining room where i asked them when they would be back, and they said in 2007. i awoke feeling like i had just emerged from anesthesia, and my whole body was tingling for about an hour afterwards. i kept feeling the skin on my face because my skin seemed to be absent in space or just felt different. i can't explain it. i quickly reasoned that 2007 was backward in time, and convinced myself this was just a very, very intense dream. i was quite shaken up by it and looked and saw that my window was open in the dead of winter! i don't know what to make of all of this. i used to have contact with ufo's in az as i had said before. but this is the first time in maine that anything like this has happened. a dream vs virtual reality?? i don't know. it really shook me up.
content.summary: Possible alien abduction vs intense dream??

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work, it was 5:45am and completely dark i was on a quiet street by the lake...I saw a cluster of bright white lights.  i thought it was a helicopter.  as i got closer i realized it was a triangular shaped object with white lights at the corners and a red blinking light in the back,  the object was only maybe 200 feet in the air and just hovered there. it was completely silent, i rolled down my car windows as i approached where the object was.  there was not a noise to be heard,  no birds, bugs, the air wasn't moving.  as i drove toward the object it began to turn and slowly began to drift away toward the lake. i felt nervous approaching the object because i had to drive under it to continue driving,  i parked my car and just stared at the object while it moved away although i don't remember seeing it actually leave,  i just saw that it was gone when i realized 17 minutes had passed. when i first saw the object my clock said 5:48am, when i realized the object was gone it was 6:05am. i felt dazed and distracted and couldn't place what had happened. i went into work and immediately began to draw what i had seen.  i almost felt obsessed with having to get down what i had seen. i also felt the need to just stand outside like i thought it was coming back.  i had to focus on how i was acting if others saw me,  i wasn't acting crazy, just dazed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: It was about 6:45 am and i was walking up to the upper barn to feed the goats and i looked to the west because the sun was rising in the east and i saw this long pulsating white cylinder like bright light pulsating above the trees and as some regular air traffic in the air but just passenger jets and looked at it for about 9 or so minutes keeping track of the time off my cell phone and just faded away.
content.summary: Bright long cylinder light.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time was on christmas. i was making a joke with gf saying it must be the star of bethlehem. hasnt been back until about 3:14 this morning, and still there now at 6:00. thought it was satellite at first but far too close, and definitely not a helicopter. sits in the east southeastern sky.
looked up event on google sky, and the nearest anomoly is vega.... this is definitely not vega
content.summary: Second time bright light appeared in sky for hours... still there

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a subdivision 20 minutes west of columbus, ohio located in the country at the western edge of galloway, ohio.  from my home i have now had numerous sightings of this object in a seven week period. on the night of the latest sighting there were a lot of planes in the sky in the area with a peculiar plane as well which flew over just east of the subdivision at low altitude  about four hours earlier in a northeasterly direction.  i did catch a video of it.  i mention this plane because it seems every time i catch this ufo/orb/fireball object on film, 3 times now, this low flying airplane with an unusually bright front fuselage makes it's appearance.
  
i made an official report of the second sighting /first video with mufon 12/9/2010 but couldn't upload the video. the first time i filmed the object the peculiar plane passed close by during the video at low altitude, almost right over my house.( see first attached video to see that sighting )  i saw a similar looking plane ( with a brightly lit forward portion of the fuselage) christmas eve pass to the southeast at low altitude, maybe 3/4 mile away. that night i set up my camera on a tripod and left it on the front porch facing the area.  at about 9:29 pm est that night my camera caught a brief 5 seconds flash of what appears to be the same ufo/orb/fireball object just over the treeline to the southeast of where the first video/second sighting had been taken place. ( see 2nd attached video to see object ) this was the third sighing. in that video you can see a quick flash just over the tree line and a few seconds later just to the left the object starts to illuminate out of the darkness growing in intensity and in mass and then dimming back out to the point of no light at all,(illumination and de-lumination was a five second process) but you can still see the object very dimly head off to the left for a few seconds.  then about thirty second later there was another quick flash in the same spot as the first flash.

the latest and fourth sighting( see third attached video ) took place december 30th, 2010 at 9:36 pm, also from my front porch, and in the same exact spot as the third sighting.  i watched the sky off and on that evening because there was a lot of air traffic and it was a very clear warm night out.  i peered out my window and saw an object to the south east over the tree line just before 9:30 so i grabbed the camera and headed to the front door to see what it might be and started shooting.  in the video you can see what appears to be a very bright fireball drifting towards the camera from over the trees, 4 to 6 hundred yards maybe. i zoomed in and out.  as i zoomed in the second time the object changed from a fireball to kind of a large pulsating orb growing brighter and dimmer in intensity, sometimes even blacking completely out.  

i caught over a minute of footage of the pulsating at mid to high zoom and maybe 3 hundred yards out at that time.  

it looks as if during the pulsating period of over a minute that the object starts on my side of the tree line and only travels a few hundred feet at best, which couldn't possibly be a plane.  even stranger, the object veers off to the left slowly and eventually disappears behind and below the roof line of the house in the foreground ( which is about 300 feet away from the camera ), which means the object was between the tree line and the house in the foreground because the tree line is above the top of the roof that the object disappeared behind.  which also means it couldn't possibly be a plane (since the neighborhood wasn't wiped out by a massive plane crash that evening, doesn't have an airport in it and the object never resurfaced)

it might take a while to download the videos if your computer is as slow as mine, but you can also view the sightings on youtube if you type in *info about link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg). feel free to visit the site and ask me whatever questions you might have.  i will do what i can to help.

seems very strange whatever it is and  it to seems to frequent the area.
content.summary: Fireball, then large pulsating orb or ufo...Fourth  similar sighting in neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
It happened in a sort of desert beach in the amazonic region in norht brazil this past december. the object appeared in the sky leaving a trace  of smole behind it and then disappeared, then, it reappeared this time dropping from the sky sort of like a meteorite except that it zig zagged s it dropped very fast again leaving a trace of smoke behind it and then splashed into the water raising a large amount of water that even scared some on the inhabitants of the samall fisherman village where it happened. a couple of years ago i , myself , alongwith other 10 to 12 eople observed a very large and long shaped cigar object at nigh in the same beach. on the ocassion we figured that the object was at least 2 to 3 kilometers long and very silent. now, this crash incident happened right in front of us. my personal opinion is that it is still there and it was not like a large metheorite.

if you wish you can contact me on the phones i provided above.

thank you
content.summary: See detailed description.

content.detailedDescription:
Feeling down or sad, the phone rang and i felt the need to open the door and look up at one region of the sky and i spotted a ufo heading southbound. thereafter, i felt instantly gratified and thankful because, i think the ufo visitations offer me a sense of security, peace of mind and understanding. i'm usually either emotional or feeling selfless when these sightings come to my attention or get an urge to "look up" because, i literally "feel" something is up there.

i was thinking about time travel, men in black, the future and the past.

i also was feeling annoyed about how it's winter and i rarely get the chance to observe the night sky to potentially encounter ufos. longing for spring/summer to come. wondering if i'd get another sighting.

so by law of attraction or intelligent design, one came for me to see...

that's my interpretation.
content.summary: A series of affects occurred for me to spot a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: it was a clear night i was out looking at the stars there was a lot af air traffic.I was looking to the nnw and i saw what i thought was a airplane turned on its landing light theres no airports within 25 miles in any direction the light looked like it was about 4 or 5 miles im just guessing at the distance it looked like a landing light when it first came on only it kept getting brighter and turned a very bright red there was kind of a hazy glow like it was shining through a lite cloud layer only i hadnt noticed any cloud layer that i could see.Very clear conditions some clouds way off to the north but nothing in this immediate area of the light.It stayed very bright for a few seconds maybe 3 or4 then started to dim down and went out.I was expecting to see red and green nav. lights but the sky was just black except for stars and airplanes with their strobes and nav.Lights in tne distance nothing in the same area as the light.I was kinda puzzled and went back in and told my wife that i had seen something odd in the sky.Then i went back out and continued watching tje sky in the same area after about 5 minutes the same light in the same area of the sky i estimate that it was probably about 1500to2000 altitude it lasted about 4or5 seconds went out again i continued to watch the sky in the same area it happened again after a few minutes.Then i continued to watch for about 20 minutes.Ive watched the sky here for quite awhile ive watched sattelites every clear night,ive seen all kinds of aircraft from helicopters to jets at all levels.Piston  engine aircraft flying low and slow.Ive never saw anything that lookedlike this,it was in the same location all three times i saw it there was no sound the airplanes were all at higher levels and far enough away that i couldnt hear them.
content.summary: Red light thought it was aircraft landing light at first.

content.detailedDescription: Not sure on the exact date, it was a last minute trip to the beach with some school friends who had just graduated so it was around june. it started i was walking down the beach with a friend when the object caught my eye against the dark night sky because their were no other lights out over the gulf. the craft seemed to come from the water but was most deffinately in the sky now, both of us are now focused on the object hovering what seemed to be 1000 ft above the surface. we were both in immediate agreeance in what it was and an odd state of calmness came over us as we watched with complete fearlessness, considering the circumstances.  we continued to observe the vehicle fly at incredible speeds with no sound what so ever, fly east, taking off slow and then was instantly at the farthest end of the beach we could see then shot straight up into the sky and then shot passed us to the west. after watching it for about five minutes or more i'm not sure for some reason it's hard to remember how long we stood there but it eventually came back down close to where we first seen it and it seemed to fall onto the water then disapear either into the water or over the horizon but it seemed to go into the water since the lights on it were still the same size.I remember after it was gone related or not, the wind all of a sudden was blowing very hard and a small shower came over and lasted for about 10 minutes. the lights on it were in a circular pattern around the craft then one on top and one on bottom, so it wasn't a shape i could see except for the lights leading me to think or under the illusion that it was a saucer shape with a bulb on top and bottom or kinda like the shape of a planet with ring's silohoutte. the colors of the lights were different but i can't remember the colors but i know their was atleast three different colors because the light on top and bottom was red and the lights around it are the ones i can't remember what color they were. blue, green, and white are colors that come to mind but alot of confusion comes to mind when i think about those lights and it's been a couple of years and it was never a big deal to us that we seen it for some reason we have both been very calm about the whole ordeal. after the craft was gone we continued down the beach talking about it completely calm as if we had seen it thousands of times but it was the first time for either of us to have seen anything like that. i've always believed that the possibility of life evolving on other planets was possible i never thought i would actually witness something like this,not that i'm saying this came from another planet but i am saying i have never seen anything manuver like this before. i know what i seen and so does my friend. i still call him every now and again to ask him if he really seen it to just to make sure i'm not crazy. so im either a crazy who hullucinated just once in my life seen something at the same exact time as someone standing right beside me that just so happen to hullucinate the very same shape and assortment of colors as i did and we are both just crazy or it was real. it was real. everyone i have told has said i was high or that i'm crazy or think we were joking trying to get a laugh out of everyone but my story hasn't changed and it never will. i seen a ufo, alien or secret military technology don't know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo seen over gulf moving at high speeds and coming out of and going back into the water

content.detailedDescription:
My sister & i saw this.  the very light blue streak disappeared as the red glow disappeared.
jw & lsc
content.summary: Large deap red glow.  could not see a defined shape.  lasted at least 20 + min. in a large area in one spot. it diid decend.  still could not see a definite image.  very light blue horizontal  streak to the east side of it.  all this in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: My then boyfriend, now husband and i were traveling west on hwy 90 just outside of pace, florida. it was about 9:00 pm on a friday night, clear weather conditions, 4 lane highway with tall pines to the south and a clearing to the right as the causeway was approaching. no buildings in this rural area, no street light that i recall but there may have been some spaced very far apart. there was very light traffic. as we came down a small incline and approached the straight-a-way i noticed 2 lights hovering above the highway, about 2 miles ahead. they were white and a little brighter and larger than car head-lights. i asked my boyfriend what the lights were and he said it looked like a small plane's wing lights. perhaps it was trying to land on the highway. as we drew closer i noticed the object seemed suspended above our side of the highway, about 100 feet in the air. it wasn't moving at all. the lights appeared to be on either end of the hovering object. we slowed down wondering what the object could be. there was a car coming in the opposite direction who was going at normal speed (probably 50 mph) seemingly not to notice the object. when our car was about 100 ft from the object a bright spotlight came from one end and shined on our car for about 2-3 seconds. it was not blinding, but bright. we slowed down on our approach, i rolled down my window and stuck my head out to have a look. the object was not very large, maybe as long as 2 semi trucks and about 20 feet wide. i could not see any details, only a dark shape above me. we pulled off to the side of the road immediately and so did the truck behind us. the car that had been going east-bound continued without slowing down at all. the two of us got out of our car and the 3 occupants in the truck got out as well (2 men and a woman) "what the hell was that!" one guy said to us. we all stood looking at the hovering object. it made no sound at all. we observed it for a few minutes then it rose vertically a few hundred feet and moved away, very smoothly, south east. we watched it until the trees blocked our view. it was not in a hurry, it did not make any sound, it did not move like a blimp, a helicopter or a plane. there wasn't much converstation between the 5 of us. i think we were all a little bewildered. one of the men said, "we won't tell if you won't!" we all laughed and got in our vehicles. when we arrived to our destination about 20 minutes later we called the pensacola naval air station to see if anyone had reported anything unusual. they said no. the next day there were no reports on the news or in the paper. the only difference my husband recalls in my recollection is that the lights were red, not white.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object observed hovering over highway, put spotlight on our car, made no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I live in boise, id and walk approximately four miles home from work every night.  since about november 11, 2009 i have seen stars engaged in markedly non-star-like activities every single night that i have have walked home from work in the dark.  my walk home takes about an hour so i get quite a bit of time to observe the night sky.  

i have routinely witnessed "stars" change color rapidly (from blue to red to green to orange, etc.) as well as change size rapidly.  i have watched "stars" go out completely only to reappear several seconds or even minutes later.  in the boise night sky, i have witnessed up to 13 of these anomolous "stars" in a given evening all over the sky in every direction.  there are approximately 7 of them that are reliably present every single night.  these "stars" of which i speak are quite obviously not like the rest of the actual stars in the sky.  

as a result of spending so much time observing the night sky, i have done quite a bit of studying to satisfy my curiousity about these bizarre star-like satelites (i assume they must be satelites of some sort...Man-made or otherwise.) and have learned a great deal about astronomy in general as a result.  

less than two months ago, while walking home, i observed two of the "stars" in orion's belt not only change size, intensity and color (seemingly in response to one another), but they actually at one point they quickly swooped around each other!  even after becoming accustomed to seeing these "flashers" as i call them, seeing that caused me to drop the coffee i was holding onto the sidewalk and stare, mouth agape for at least a full five minutes.  

i hold a master's degree in engineering and have worked for the government since i finished graduate school five years ago.  i am quite sane and completely at a loss as to what these "flashers" imitating actual stars are up to.  

these "flasher"-satelites, if they are indeed man-made, do not behave like any publicly known man-made satelites.  to my knowledge, no government on earth has created a satelite that can not only mimmick actual stars but travel in a quick, agile and independent manner.

so maryland witness, what i am saying here is that you are not alone:)
content.summary: Response to md 1/5/2011 report.  i have also seen them every night since nov. 2009.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching tv as my mother got a phone call,she seemed to be urgent when she told me to help her look for something outside. as we went outside i said what are we looking for and she said her sister,my aunt, just got off work and was wondering if she was seeing things or what and wanted us to look up in the air and see if we could see the same thing she was seeing since it was right across the street from our house,about 20 feet. so when i initially looked up,while standing in our front yard,i seen nothing and since my mother couldnt see it either ,she replied we dont see anything. my aunt evidently was still insisting on us to look more cause she knew she wasnt crazy and was lookin right at it almost above our house,but towards the other side of the street about 10-20 feet. so since there was a big tree in our front yard at the street i walked under it and went i got to the street and looked up, my god i said, look moma look!Here it is here it is. my mom said were are you looking as she walked towards me next to the street,and then she seen it,oh my god louda,she replied to my aunt, i dont know what that is,then i think my aunt said on the phone,i knew i wasnt crazy,what do think that is. from that point on i couldnt get my eyes off of it as it just hovered in mid air with no noise and spinning rather slowly,it had no wabble at all and was the picture perfect ufo.I will never forget this ,i thought, as i was watching it,slowly i started to watch the windows on the craft because they looked to be different in shape all the sudden,but i didnt notice the different shapes of the windows at first at all for either being startled or maybe they wasnt different at first,i really dont know. as i was watching the windows all the sudden i started making out letters,these windows say (texaco found oil) as the craft spins. what in the world i thought,mom can you read what the windows say as that thing spins, she says she never could but i know what i read on those windows. then this perfectly shaped ufo starts to go towards our local dirt track that we can see the from our house and when it got close to the race track you should have heard the roar of the people over there. it was like aahhhhhh, but very loud for us to hear them from our house. when it got to the race track its like it was checking things out since it just hovered there for a while,like it did at our house, and then finally starting back going north at a very slow rate of speed. after it got  quite a piece from our house and we couldnt make it out anymore we went back in the house. it was for sure being controlled because of its actions,like stopping at our house, then easing over to the racetrack and stopping, then taking back off again. all in all, i still to this day have never found out how this thing hovered in one spot,spinning,with no noise,and definetly looked very shiny,metallic metal of some sort,and if it was, it must have been somewhat heavy. plenty of people seen this thing but i never heard anything else about it. ive always wondered, if texaco found oil,why would they send a perfectly looking ufo to my house to let me, and the people down my street, know that they found some oil, doesnt make any sense to me but what do i know about texaco and there advertising if thats what is really was,then so be it,but it seems to me like that would be a waste just to let people know.!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shiny metalic looking,looked like windows lit,spinnig slowly,could see each window,made no noise,seem to put out a vibration or hum

content.detailedDescription:
While walking my dogs i noticed a star moving! i watched closely as it was not a plane on any of the trails they usually followed and i have never seen anything move like this before.
it didn't seem to be following any particular course as it moved in sharp rapid arcs and very fast yet short zips for lack of a better description.
it always seemed to remain fairly close to the same position or if it moved very far at all, it would work its way back to near its starting point. it also would move in short swings to and fro and seemed to receed downward or back to its begining place after it would move seemingly upward. after watching it for some minutes i noticed a second light which seemed to be sparking to life near the first or main light. this second light never attained the same brightness as the first and "fizzeled out"
shortly after showing up. shortly there after, the main light seemed to also "fizzel out" and disappeared.
my wife was with me for the last 5 minutes of this observation and saw the same thing i saw as it was happening.
i was in my yard near taneytown, md.
the light was at approx. 15-20 degrees elevation to my wnw just south of the lights of ski liberty above the mountain crest.
it never traveled more than approx. 1.5 to 2 degrees from where i first saw it but it moved in ways i cannot explain.
i will be watching for it again tonite 1/6/11 after dark.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike light moving eratically seemed to be west of mountains near emmittsburg, md.

content.detailedDescription: I cannot write this down. its hard to explain, not how it looked but the behaviou. i am sure i could tell the story exactly. its taken me 36 yrs to get to this point i've never told anyone.
content.summary: I got a very close look at the ufo

content.detailedDescription: I just wanted to confirm to the florida state officer, who's sighting occured on 1-1-2011 in homestead. this was the similar thing i witnessed in fort knox in '69. although my sighting i really can't say it was round or saucer shape. it did leave the same mark on the ground. round, burnt like grass. can't remember if there was white ash but distincly remember the deadened ring of grass. i got ridiculed by others looking at it and i was young. fourth- fifth grade at the time so i stowed it away for many years until my report last year here @ mufon. i just wanted the similarities pointed out. thanks, john
content.summary: Glowing white light/silent

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking and waiting for my friend to come outside. i was standing by my car when i looked up and suddenly i saw a flash of light. it looked like a flying ruler but enormous. it seemed to be passing by the earth faster than the speed of light because it appeared then just as fast it disappeared. it was dark out so when it appeared the lights were vivid, two round lights and what could have been a row of other lights but it moved so fast they appeared to be a solid line. i just happened to be looking up there, no real reason. i rationalized that it was some space gases, satellite, plane, etc...No of which fit with the size,speed, or shape. it appeared and disappeared so fast it didnt occur to me what was happening. after i felt excited, and a bit scared that i saw it, i could live with not knowing because the thought of some other species having the capabilities to design and build something like that leads me to believe that they also have weaponry and intelligence to match. i just hope they aren't destructive like humans. the object just disappeared into the dark morning sky, the same way it appeared, super fast and mysteriously.
content.summary: Moved fast, was rectangular, huge, black, had 2 lights visible, on either end. maybe more but moved so fast were blurred

content.detailedDescription: I saw pulsating starlike light or object when i was stand at my apartment balcony,i saw  while 15 minute object is stable on air then move slowly to left side and pulsating reddish light became lower and disappear. i always loking to sky when i have time and i have astronomy knowledge,i think that was no star or plane it was wery strange to me...
content.summary: Pulsating stable stralike object in nightsky

content.detailedDescription:
Object was filmed around 4:39 am to the best i can ascertain.  i don't remember shooting this video but it was found in my video cam just after another video of another strange light i shot video of just prior.  i did go outside my front door and film the other object but not sure what happened to get this footage accidently.  i have no memory of taking footage or of seeing the object that is clearly very close to the camera a few hundred feet away it appears appearing to be close to the ground.  looks like the settings on my video camera very changed here too since you cant see the houses across the street at the end of my court.  it all boggles me, but can clearly see the object and to the left of the video.  can see the neighbors front door to the right and what appears to be the street light at the end of the court in the middle.

i posted this object and made the report only because it appears to be very similar to the sighting report someone posted her on 1/4/11 from cleveland, ohio
content.summary: Strange object with four colored pulsating lights- similar to 1/4/11cleveland, 0hio object

content.detailedDescription: I am located in a small rural town in ohio. i have continued over the course of the last month to see unusual objects that i have some pictures and videos of.  i am hoping that by posting my story, someone would take enough interest and come investigate, considering these objects keep coming back.  i do not know if they are bona-fide ufo's, however, they seem quite unusual.
content.summary: Unusual objects keep reappearing

content.detailedDescription: On 1-1-2011 at about 9:50pm i was sitting in my patrol car in milltown,in when i noticed a bright orange light that was not flashing traveling west to east . i exited my vehicle and observed the orange light travel overhead at about 1000 feet this light did not flash and traveled at a moderate speed with no sound it was a clear cold night i could see other planes overhead with their lights flashing i was 45 minutes west of louisville, ky and plane traffic is common in my area. i observed this object for about 2 minutes i lost sight of it as it went west.
content.summary: Bright non flashing soundless object

content.detailedDescription: I work security in downtown cleveland and i went outside to do my rounds and i looked up at the building and above the building and there were lights spining and then they stoped.I got pics of it this thing was triangle with 6 lights on it.So i called housekeeping down to see it and they ran back inside of the building.So then it took off and at 6:45am it was up there for about 20min.That whole night felt weird and my radio was  making weird noises.Thats my story what do u thank?
content.summary: Lights over my building downtown cleveland it had a haze with lights and took off very fast

content.detailedDescription:
Just gonna answer questions in order, (may get more detailed if i feel like it.. not in a long story typing mood - but wanna do this now, be4 i forget & never get to it)....

1.) on the evening of dec. 23rd, 2010 @ approx 9-9:15pm, i was standing in the back parking lot of my work (a bar in san jose's 'burbank' area).. i had just gotten off work, i had not been drinking, i was smoking a cigarette while ************ w/ some customers.

2.) while we were ************ i glanced at the sky. (i am sorta known for sky gazing - i think its so pretty.. clouds/stars/moon/sunrise&set, all pretty.) it had been overcast past days before then and so the crisp clear sky was more noticable & special looking. the stars were really bright (for city sky) particularly orion, & moon was big (full moon & lunar eclipse just 2 days before).. i was in middle of pointing up & saying "look how pretty" to my friend, when i noticed that one, a big bright reddish/orange 'star', was moving upwards.. "hey that ones moving" i pointed & said after a moment. normally i pry wouldnt have pointed out some moving light in the sky.. we live in a valley w/ a good amount of air traffic, & airplanes/helicopters are no wonderous thing to take note of. (thats one thing that leads me to believe it wasnt normal.. it wasnt like i was conscious of it 'not being' normal vehicle, i just sort of instinctually automatically knew it was something else.)
we watched it move upwards towards orions belt in the sky (im bad a judging distances.. but it was pretty freaking high! like up in high atmosphere high.) then it moved left, swinging around towards & then under the moon, & it grew larger/closer as it did this. by then we were both (may have been 1 or 2 others out there then too?) openly wondering what it was: a helicopter? no. there's absolutely no noise. an airplane? no. no flashing lights. what is that? - all in all we watched it for a pretty long time. 5+ minutes @ least.

3.)a star (or planet - cuz so bright, & reddish)

4.)after getting a good long (& relatively close) look at it, im confident in describing it as such....
a reddish/orange/amber 'orb'.. it sorta glided through the sky, kinda fast too (faster than floating balloon speed, thats for sure - oh, & there was no wind at all that night anyway). when i intially noticed it, it was really bright.. then as we watched, it got dimmer (but never completely went out), then lit up again (repeated this 2.5 times). it was almost like it was a ball w/ fire in it. no other lights. absolutely no noise omitted at all. it was a tiny bit darkers in areas, it seemed.. like the bottom, i wanna say.. but basically, it was colored/shadded in a way that u could tell it was a sphere, a ball. - ya know?

5.) as we watched we were both just sort of mystified. im all rational thinking, so even though i pointed it out & noticed it was odd, i was kinda trying to justify it. "its a helicopter. right?" no, my friend said, theres no noise, heli's are loud. "well its gotta be something. weather balloon? is that what weather balloons look like?" i dunno said my friend.. (as it was dimming/relighting) "but its dimming, oh, here it comes back.. i dunno what that is, but its ******* wierd!" just then he ran inside bar to get someone else. 
i just kept staring at it, trying to figure out what i was seeing. at one point i thought, & may have even said, someone should record this. i even had my blackberry in my hand.. but i didnt even try.(?!?!) - i think i figured it'd be futile, cuz my blkberry takes shitty pics/video under good conditions.. let alone at night of something sorta smallish. now, i regret not trying. stupid.
afterwards, like 30min later, as i drove home i saw a helicopter & then an airplane.. it was then that the oddness of it really set in. after seeing those the difference was strikingly evident.. no blinking lights, just one solid orb! no sound! wtf?! also, it occured to me that the whole time while we were watching it, there was not one other aircraft in the sky anywhere.. which is odd, because like i said, pretty heavy traffic area. - almost no time between 6am-1am that you cant go out, look up, & see a plane or 2.. almost dont even notice them anymore. its when there's none out, that its more noticable, you could say.

6.)it moved behind the roof of bar in the horizon, & i ran to the side & front to see if i could spot it again.. i did, from the front of bar, just as it moved far off enough so that i could not see it past the rooftops across the street. it seemed to be headed north.. and was a lot lower at this point too.

ok is all. oh, quick side note.. i told this to a coworker a few days later (& he's a huge skeptic type.. not at all magical mystical conspiracy thinking sorta guy).. and he said he saw it also, w/in 1-2 days of my sighting (timeline wasnt 100%). he had also seen it while smoking out back w/ a customer.. only his experience was in daytime (between 7am-10am i guess, thats when he works). another difference was when he saw it it was glowing white then turned orange/red, it too did the dimming/relighting thing, but then he said after following it for a few minutes across the horizon, it just blinked out. (?!?!) i believe him completely, because he told me this before i had chance to explain any details about what i saw. all i had said is i seen something strange @ work. and it was 'technically' a ufo, to me @ least. 

then i google searched it. i found dozens & dozens of videos, pictures, & blogs & such that show or describe almost the exact same thing! (there are some that are similair but w/ differences too.) i couldnt find any more for the same time & location as mine though. - and i dont think it was a weather balloon or lantern thing.. although, if i could find out a way to know if a wb was flying round there at that time, id check it out 4 sure too.

and that is my story. never seen anything ufo-ish before in my life. not even particularly stoked that i did. just really curious.
content.summary: An amber glowing orb, that would dim (but not completely disappear) & then get brighter again.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of july 29, 2007 me and my family went to visit the empire state building in new york, ny. first we went to the observatory on the 86th floor, there i take lots of pictures, then decided to raise to the floor 102, there a friend asked me to take her picture, i taken the picture and left the building. when i get home i went to see the photos of that day and when i see the picture of my friend on the 102th floor, i was surprised when i see a serie of strange lights that, when i zoomed in i can see these lights have square shape as windows. i thought it was a reflection of some light, but at the small observatory there was no light that looked like what it saw in the photo. when i went back to venezuela i lost the memory stick of my camera but yesterday i found it in my old suitcase so today i write this.

is weird because when i was at the empire state we didn't see those lights but in the picture the lights can be seen perfectly.

- i dont speak english so i used a translate software to write this, sorry if this text have errors.

i attach the photo of the object, if anyone want additional information, the original photo or the other pictures taken that day contact me:

*(wit's email address deleted -- cms/sg).

this is the 2nd time i make this report because the first time i make it the image didnt upload because it have a virus. i make a antivirus scan on it and it does not have any virus, i change the name of the file to trie a second time to upload the picture, if it doestn upload follow this link to watch the photo: (link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: A picture taken from the empire state show strange ligths

content.detailedDescription:
my son screamed,"mom a ufo!" i said,"are you kidding?" he said "no mom it really is a ufo." so naturally i ran to his bedroom window so fast my feet didn't touch the floor. it was the urgency in his voice that concerned me. just out of his southern window was what looked like a horizontail shooting star.Heading due east through the air with a little firey tail. 1..2..3..It suddenly changed into a flashing star and up it went blinking red..Blue..Green..White..Amber. then poof next to it red.Blink.Blinlk. white.. .. and to the south of it two more blinking lights red..Blue..Amber. so then i started to lose my count because it looked as though lightning bugs were let out of a jar..Twinkling the colors of the rainbow. we were so excited counting and screaming the colors as they flashed on/off.The sky was cloudless filled with humidity. so we guessed as to how close and how bright the objects were. five was the number we agreed that we saw. however, they were all over the place while tightly huddled together in a central area. then the squadron moved further west and poof they were all gone. we were in shock knowing that we needed video proof i ran to my bedroom to get our little polaroid digital camra. just in case. bam they were back. my son started to wonder if we were being invaded. calming his fears i went onto the porch. we saw them going west then circling to the north then they were out of our line of vision, for one hour we watched these strange lights. we did take footage. we can't be sure if the ufo's are visible the batteries died.It is too late to go out now and everybody is asleep. one thing that stands out in my mind that seems strange the whole ufo observation was never disturbed by any sound,the air was eerie feeling. it was like a dream slow and still..No backgroun noise at all. my son was pretty upset. he wants to know who is flying those ufo's. it's upsetting that we know very little about these visitors flying over our heads at night while we sleep.
we need full disclosure a>s>a>p>  write to the 112th congress on top of all the other mess we need to make full disclosure availabe to the citizens that pay the budget......O.K. cia-fbi-atf-abc's
content.summary: Exciting tonight a new congress and some ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hwy 183 south exiting goldthwaite when i topped a hill leaving the city limits. i was talking to my son on the cell phone when he said he saw something strange down our county road towards our house. it was a very bright flashing white light. when he said that i looked out my pickup window to the right and saw the light too from where i was on the highway but as i went down the hill i lost sight of it.  he said it was still in front of him and flashing slowly.  i made him stop on the dirt road because he believed it to be not even a half of a mile ahead of him.  i turned right on county road 411 and saw the flashing light again. it looked to be less than a mile away.  my son was in his pickup two vehicles ahead of me, my husband was in his pickup between us as we headed down the dirt road toward the house.  i was still talking to my son about the light and how it was flashing strangely like it had three different flash points. the light would flash from left to right and then start at the left again. as we were driving down the road we watched it about a mile and a half down the road.  it didn't move as if it were going up and down the hills of the road, in fact it did not appear to be moving forward on the ground.  we never got any closer to it but it never really got any further away. i mean like the size of the light never seemed to get smaller or fade. and then it was gone.  i thought i had lost sight of it due to the hills and valleys in the road.  but when i topped the hill again where i knew i could see it, it was no where in sight.  if it had been an ordinary vehicle, i would have seen it from the top of the hill.  if it had been an airplane we would not have lost sight of it because it would have still been in the air.  as fas as i can tell it just disappeared.
content.summary: Extremely bright flashing light that seemed to have three flash points seen on the county road that has never been there before and disappeared in thin air.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my kitchen facing east, talking with girlfriend and another couple over visiting. i feel and hear the humming sound go over my head heading east, im boggled, visiting girl suggests fighter planes, then i dont buy it. run to front window (still humming noise loudly) and catch grayscale ship coloring underneath, white lighting on edges in 3-4 spots, solid and blinking, no other colors. though star trek enterprise with the main part only, but a couple hundred feet wide thats all. huge though. 

large craft approx 150-250ft wide if i had to guess, floated over my house heading northeast, low altitude, 1000ft maybe ? at the highest. then raised a little higher, made a swooping sideways left turn, could tell it was round or square shape, and headed north over the ridge out of sight. the largest and most convincing sighting ive had. i've seen small ones around here and there but this was insane. several other small odd lights in the sky, but they are there often..

hoping someone else sees of hears this thing, it was like a humming slash boat horn, very low alt, never seen anything like it. no time to go find camera i was speechless after i looked out the window, yelled for them to follow and ran outside as it had just passed overhead and was crossing my street.
content.summary: Vibrates over house, 150ft wide, slowly moving, passes over me then heads north, 5 min from stewart airport, not a plane
